channel.title: Comments on: Eric Greenwood’s Top Albums of 2010

item.title: By: Rabble
item.dc:creator: Rabble
item.description:
Stephin Merritt is 44 years old!
Nice list!

item.title: By: K
item.dc:creator: K
item.description: Surprised to see Realism on your list. Also, I've never listened to that Sadier record, but I love her voice, so I suspect I'll like it. That Weekend record is amazing. Slumberland is back!
item.content:encoded: Surprised to see Realism on your list. Also, I’ve never listened to that Sadier record, but I love her voice, so I suspect I’ll like it. That Weekend record is amazing. Slumberland is back!
